left2right.description: The objects are sorted from left to right in this section. The IDs of the object are presented starting with the left most element first

top2bottom.description: The objects are sorted from top to bottom in this section. The IDs of the object are presented starting with the top most element first

small2big.description: The objects are sorted in terms of their size from small to big. The IDs of the object are presented starting with the top most element first
